town_skills.name: Quarantine
town_skills.effect:
1.Decrease the infest rate.
2.No Traveler is allowed to leave this village next turn.

town_skills.name: Develop Tech
town_skills.effect: Use Research Power to develop your techs for progress.

town_skills.name: Cure
town_skills.effect: Cure 20%~30% of infected population in this village
